response.overview: Gay adult superstar Ray Dragon makes his TitanMen directing debut, in collaboration with lead director Brian Mills, with the all-sex feature Boot Camp: ManPlay 24. The director may be new, but the fierce ManPlay sexuality stays the same--striking all-new TitanMen performers in unscripted, spontaneous sexual episodes that deliver straight up the kind of gritty, masculine sexuality that's always been Dragon's personal specialty. And don't worry--there's no fake army crap in Boot Camp: ManPlay 24! Just ten men who've enlisted for three extended scenes of steamy, sweat covered, barracks buddy sex. Muscled Darius Falke--a new TitanMen exclusive--makes his explosive film debut with Sergio Anthony and Adam Faust.
response.title: Boot Camp: Manplay 24
